about-section.title: About Me
about-section.description: I'm a Software Developer who enjoys building tools. Not the sharpest tool in the shed, but I'm curious and a fast learner.

projects-section.title: Projects
projects-section.description: These are some of my projects:

projects.gsk: The webpage of a farmaceutical company called GSK to raise awareness about the Herpes Zoster.
projects.t2: A TUI to track the time you spend on a project.
projects.term2: A neovim plugin to open a terminal above the current buffer.
projects.stda: The webpage of a farmaceutical company called GSK to raise awareness about respiratory diseases.
projects.pokerpay: The webpage to calculate a poker game with your friends.
projects.showdown: The webpage to analyze a pokemon showdown game.
projects.bdm: The webpage of a farmaceutical company called GSK to raise awareness about the Meningitis.
projects.vsr: The webpage of a farmaceutical company called GSK to raise awareness about the Respiratory Syncytial Virus.
